body: Planning my first international trip this summer! Any tips for a #firsttimetraveler? #travel #vacation #summer

comments.body: That’s exciting! My advice: pack light. You’ll thank yourself later, especially if you plan to move around a lot.
@72727 Thanks for the tip! I have a tendency to overpack, so I’ll have to be mindful of that.
Definitely bring copies of your important documents, like your passport. You never know what might happen.
@93939 Good call! I also recommend emailing copies to yourself just in case.
Yes, that’s a great idea @84848. Having digital copies can be a lifesaver.
Make sure you learn some basic phrases in the local language. It goes a long way in showing respect, even if it’s just 'hello' and 'thank you.'
@61616 That’s a great idea! I’ve been thinking about doing that. It probably makes the experience more enjoyable too.
Don’t forget travel insurance. It might seem unnecessary, but it can save you a lot of hassle if something goes wrong.
@53535 I’ve heard mixed things about travel insurance. Do you think it’s worth it even for a short trip?
Definitely, @48484. Even for short trips, unexpected things can happen. It gives you peace of mind.
